programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: Alvin and Lance, his girlfriend’s brother, leave the city behind to spend the summer of 1988 repainting traffic lines on a desolate country highway, bickering and joking their way into an unlikely friendship.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: A young American backpacker in Germany falls in love with a fellow American travelling through Europe. When she is diagnosed with a fatal disease, He decides to steal from a gangster to pay for medical treatment. As he is pursued across Germany, he races to save their lives

programme.title: 10th And Wolf
programme.desc: A former street tough returns to his Philadelphia home after a stint in the military. Back on his home turf, he once again finds himself tangling with the mob boss who was instrumental in his going off to be a soldier.

programme.title: Piranhaconda
programme.desc: Two piranha/anaconda hybrid creatures hunt down the scientist who stole their egg and a film crew, making a slasher film in the jungle.

programme.title: Cannibal Girls
programme.desc: Eugene Levy and Andrea Martin star in this Canadian horror spoof as a couple on a romantic holiday who settle into a quaint little bed-and-breakfast run by a trio of flesh-eating ladies who fancy them for tomorrowâ€™s menu.

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: A loser and his slacker best friend who work at a soulless telemarketing company discover their new boss is a vampire who is turning their coworkers into fellow bloodsuckers.

programme.title: Shrooms
programme.desc: A group of friends are stalked and murdered whilst looking for psilocybin mushrooms in the Irish woods.

programme.title: A Fantastic Fear Of Everything
programme.desc: A crime novelist whose research on Victorian serial killers has turned him into a paranoid wreck must confront his worst fears when a film executive takes a sudden interest in his movie script.

programme.title: Tragedy Girls
programme.desc: A twist on the slasher genre, following two death-obsessed teenage girls who use their online show about real-life tragedies to send their small mid-western town into a frenzy, and cement their legacy as modern horror legends.
